analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0x873467738b5053f155639208b7495318fced5262.sol:
	Contract StreamNetworkToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/6/0x873467738b5053f155639208b7495318fced5262.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/6/0x873467738b5053f155639208b7495318fced5262.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/6/0x873467738b5053f155639208b7495318fced5262.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/6/0x873467738b5053f155639208b7495318fced5262.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
